thread.title: Nick Morley
thread.title_full: Daniels Trading reviewed by Nick Morley

author: Nick Morley
title: Nick Morley
text: I opened an account with DT by recommendation and I am happy I did. My broker is really helpful and provided I respect the fact that I am paper trading at this point, he always gets back to me when I need help. Also, the wealth of educational material on the DT site is brilliant and is really helping me edge toward my goal of trading real money.
